ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: In this highly visible role, you will lead the architecture of SoC display subsystem, including memory fabric interface, data pipe flow controls, memory compression, display interfaces, and etc.

ul.li: The ideal candidate will have 10+ years of in chip architecture, display subsystem architecture, design experience with a complete understanding of the technology
SoC display subsystem architecture and micro-architecture knowledge
Thorough understanding of SoC display sub-system architecture, interface, performance and energy tradeoffs Broad understanding of display technology
Demonstrated expertise in memory sub-system, memory interface, and DMA
Strong communication skills with cross-functional teams

div.p: The ideal candidate will be responsible for all aspects of SoC display subsystem architecture: • Work closely with SoC and fabric architects, software, and system engineers to architect SoC display subsystem • Architect display subsystems, including display pipe control, memory, and interfaces • Provide detailed architectural guidance at all levels of design throughout the design process from concept through production • Make recommendation on key design tradeoffs across architecture and performance • Author and maintain the display subsystem architecture specifications
